content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>National Geophysical Data Center</origin> <pubdate>Unknown</pubdate> <title>Seafloor Surficial Sediments (Deck 41)</title> <geoform>vector digital data</geoform> <onlink>http://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/mgg/geology/deck41.html</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>The National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC) "Deck41" database contains surficial sediment descriptions for over 36,000 seafloor samples worldwide. The file was begun by the Marine Geology and Geophysics group of the National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC) in the early 1970s and transferred to NGDC in 1975 when the group moved to Boulder, Colorado. The data were abstracted and coded by the old NODC Marine Geology and Geophysics group, primarily from corelogs, laboratory analysis sheets, and unpublished reports contributed by individuals and oceanographic institutions and agencies worldwide.  Data include collecting source, ship, cruise, sample id, latitude/longitude, date of collection, water depth, sampling device, dominant lithology, secondary lithology, and a brief description of the surficial sediment at the location.</abstract> <purpose>This data set was added in support of NOAA's Office of Ocean Exploration Regional Atlas.   It has been formatted for incorporation into a Geographic Information System database.</purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20091113</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>data download from NGDC</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>As needed</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-179.987</westbc> <eastbc>179.983</eastbc> <northbc>81.983</northbc> <southbc>-79.667</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>sediments</themekey> <themekey>cores</themekey> <themekey>bottom samples</themekey> <themekey>surficial sediments</themekey> <themekey>sediment samples</themekey> </theme> <theme> <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt> <themekey>geoscientificInformation</themekey> <themekey>oceans</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>None</placekt> <placekey>Global</placekey> <placekey>Worldwide</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst>None</accconst> <useconst>None</useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>NOAA/NESDIS/NGDC - National Geophysical Data Center</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>physical</addrtype> <address>E/GC 325 Broadway</address> <city>Boulder</city> <state>CO</state> <postal>80305</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>303-497-6826</cntvoice> <cntfax>303-497-6513</cntfax> <cntemail>ngdcinfo@noaa.gov</cntemail> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <browse> <browsen>http://www.ncddc.noaa.gov/approved_recs/ncddc_ims/gis/ims/final/surficial_sediments_ngdc_browse_sediments.jpg</browsen> <browsed>Sediment samples from the National Geophysical Data Center</browsed> <browset>JPEG</browset> </browse> <native>Original data were downloaded from NGDC's ArcIMS viewer as an ESRI shapefile.
